name: macos-updatetool
description: macos-updatetool is a CLI workflow tool designed to make updating essential resources important for developers working in a macOS environment frictionless. It handles Homebrew, npm, App Store apps, as well as Xcode resource types.

scripts.postinstall: echo 'macos-updatetool installed successfully! Run: macos-updatetool help'
